task.title: Download and install the RPM or DEB file

titlealts.navtitle: Download and install the RPM or DEB file
titlealts.searchtitle: (): Download and install the RPM or DEB file

task.shortdesc: RPM is the installation package format for Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) and SUSE Linux Enterprise Server (SLES) distributions. DEB is the package format for the Ubuntu distribution. The RPM or DEB packages contain files, samples, and groups.

context.p: To download the RPM or DEB package, complete these steps:

step.cmd: Point your Web browser at this location:
Click the appropriate link for your cryptographic coprocessor / HSM from the Products pull down choice.
Click Download software from the selected CEX*S Overview page.
On the appearing CEX*S - Software page, click the software-package selection page link.
Navigate to the desired RPM or DEB package by opening the + sign besides the appropriate release. From here, you can access the following parts:

ul.li: the RPM or DEB installation file that installs the host code
the README file for the RPM or DEB
